Index » Cache

Class: Cache

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Cache\Cache.coffee

Overview

Cache allows to store temporarily data and get it quickly, by getting/setting keys pair with value

Author:

  • Marvin Frachet marvin@konsserto.com

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) set(key, value) Adding a new entry in the cache using key => value

    @param value
  • # (void) remove(key) Remove an entry in the cache store by a given key name
  • # (void) removeMultiple(keys) Remove multiple entries in the cache by an array of keys
  • # (Object) get(key) Get a data paired to a given key
  • # (Object) getMultiple(keys) Get datas paired to the given array of keys
  • # (Object) getStats() Get some statistics about data stored in cache
  • # (void) flushAll() Flush everything in the cache

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor()

Constructor

Initialize the node_cache and set a cache timeout
